job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Purpose of Positions</strong></p><p>Works on a team developing, testing, debugging, and supporting new software or enhancements to existing software in support of a very complex business model.&nbsp;Role includes meeting with customers to understand their business processes and needs with the objective of determining solutions to support the business.&nbsp;This will sometimes require filling multiple roles to turn the customer's needs into actual solutions.&nbsp;Takes initiative, owns issues from start to finish, proactive communicator. Daily activities include typical software development activities (developing, testing, debugging, supporting).</p><p><strong>General Tasks and Responsibilities</strong></p><ul><li>Software analysis activities for new software or enhancements to existing software to include providing high level estimates based on limited information in support of the project governance process.</li><li>Software development activities for new software or enhancements to existing software.</li><li>Support of new and existing software.</li><li>Interaction/communication with business users regarding requirements, design reviews, prototype presentations, etc. This position may or may not manage employees based on location of incumbent.</li></ul><p><strong>Education</strong></p><p>Bachelor's in Computer Science</p><p><strong>Certifications and Licenses</strong></p><p><strong>Years of Experience</strong></p><p>0-3 years of experience</p><p><strong>Core Competencies</strong></p><p>Adaptability</p><p>Collaboration</p><p>Strives for Positive Results</p><p>Service-Oriented</p>
